word_mean: 菌苗，疫苗：减毒或灭活的微生物(如细菌、病毒或立克次体)悬浮液，用于预防或治疗传染病
用细菌、病毒、肿瘤细胞等制成的可使机体产生特异性免疫的生物制剂。

sentence.Network_en: At present, no widely approved vaccine exists for malaria.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前，还没有被广泛认可的疟疾疫苗。

sentence.Network_en: Seven million doses of vaccine are annually given to British children.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国孩子每年要接种7百万剂疫苗。

sentence.Network_en: Roll on the day someone develops an effective vaccine against malaria.
sentence.Network_cn: 盼望有一天有人会研制出一种能有效预防疟疾的疫苗。

高三英语单词列表_百度知道 ... diphtheria  n. 白喉 vaccine  n. 疫苗；菌苗 catastrophe  n. 大灾难.
分别以L.O.V.E开头的形容词_百度知道 ... vaccinal 疫苗的 vaccine 疫苗的, 牛痘的 vacillant 犹豫不决的.
考博英语词汇 ... vaccinate v. 接种；种牛痘 vaccine a. 牛痘的；痘苗的 n.牛痘苗;疫苗 vagina a. 阴道；鞘.

list.abs: 禽流感常用英语词汇翻译 ... contagious 接触传染性的 vaccinate 注射疫苗 influenza pandemic 流感流行.
婴儿期,婴儿护理,婴儿抚触_成长天地_飞华健康网 ... 婴儿喂养 INFANT FEEDING 疫苗接种 VACCINATION 微量元素 TRACE ELEME…
预防接种(VACCINATION)-施予疫苗之行为;预防接种常以注射的方式给予。免疫(IMMUNITY)-预防接种所产生之抵抗疾病的效力。
vaccination needle 接种针，种痘针vaccinator 接种器，种痘器vaccine ①菌苗，疫苗 ②牛痘苗

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin vaccinus, from vacca 'cow' (because of the early use of the cowpox virus against smallpox)

entry.def: A vaccine is a substance containing a harmless form of the germs that cause a particular disease. It is given to people, usually by injection, to prevent them getting that disease.

example.ex: Anti-malarial vaccines are now undergoing trials...
example.tran: 抗疟疾的疫苗正在试验阶段。

example.ex: Seven million doses of vaccine are annually given to British children.
example.tran: 英国孩子每年要接种7百万剂疫苗。

means.word_mean: 1. immunogen consisting of a suspension of weakened or dead pathogenic cells injected in order to stimulate the production of antibodies

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cattle can also be vaccinated with the BCG vaccine.

Sentence.sentence: Most notoriously,Oprah's validation of jenny McCarthy's claim that vaccines cause autism(自闭症)has no doubt contributed to much harm through the foolish avoidance of vaccines.
Most notoriously,Oprah's validation of jenny McCarthy's claim that vaccines cause autism(自闭症)has no doubt contributed to much harm through the foolish avoidance of vaccines.

sentences.en: She takes a vaccine against influenza every fall.
sentences.cn: 她每年秋季接种流感疫苗。

sentences.en: At a W.H.O. news conference, Marie-Paule Kieny, chief of the W.H.O.'s vaccine research initiative, estimated that the world's vaccine makers had the capacity to make a maximum of one to two billion doses of a new H1N1 vaccine within a year after getting a seed vaccine, which the C.D.C. is now working on.
sentences.cn: 在新闻发布会上，世卫组织疫苗研究创制中心主任玛丽-保罗-克妮预测，在获得种苗后，疾病预防控制中心（C.D.C.）正在研制的新型H1N1疫苗有望在1年内达到最多20亿支的产量。（nytimes.com; May 6, 2009）
